subject: Soccer
Parades
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s national soccer team brandished the World Cup trophy and basked amid improvised ticker tape in its parade in Lower Manhattan on Friday, the first for a women’s team.
snippet: The United States women’s national soccer team brandished the World Cup trophy and basked amid improvised ticker tape in its parade in Lower Manhattan on Friday, the first for a women’s team.
